website_summaries.verdict: An excellent elevation training mask if versatility is your main priority.
pros: Offers 24 adjustable resistance levels to customize your workout
Available in two sizes to fit most faces
Sleeve and strap are both washable
Includes a hard carrying case to protect the mask in your bag, as well as a one-year warranty
cons: Valves aren’t marked with the resistance levels
Some users find the strap can break down over time

customer_reviews.title: Impressive mask
customer_reviews.text: I am a marathoner and always wanted to try one of these masks and I did not make a terrible choice with this mask. It has 24 levels and is quite impressive how hard is to run with the highest level. If you are a beginner in using this mask, then start with a lower level because you will have hard time breathing just like me. I expect to improve my lungs muscle and to have better results overtime. Overall, the mask looks good, great quality, and very easy to use. Also, it provides a wonderful case that will keep your mask safe. You will not regret if you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this training mask as I needed to work on my breathing while running. I have to tell you, it was worth the investment. I used it a couple of times and the results are amazing. I am taking longer and deeper breaths, my breathing rhythm is more balanced and I can run for longer distances. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN THE MORE EXPENSIVE ONES!
customer_reviews.text: This was just perfect all the way around. Ordered this for my son in a size medium for Christmas who is 6’1” 150lbs, athletic build, and he hasn’t taken it off since! He may have even slept in it last night! 😂 Great quality and super fast shipping as well. Hell, if I’m not mistaken, it got here the day after I purchased it and I didn’t even pay for expedited shipping for this item. Can’t complain at all about this product or the seller and I paid a lot less than what the more expensive brands are charging with worse reviews. My son is one happy camper about this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lorae

customer_reviews.title: The best quality
customer_reviews.text: I love my GO4FIT workout mask! I am a personal trainer and i used to be sceptical about getting one for myself as I read all kinds of reviews of training masks in general, some positive, some negative. I am glad I finally decided to get my own and try it fr myself. The first use was a blast! I could not believe the value it adds value to my resistance training. Its way harder to do any exercise with it. In time I noticed considerable improvement in my gym workout and in my resistance trainings. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mr_Manu

customer_reviews.title: FULLY UPGRADED MY WORKOUTS! ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Workouts and cardio training using this mask have been amazing! The GO4FIT training mask fully upgraded my workouts and will surely help me get to a new level. Before I started using this mask, I did not realize I hit a wall in my workouts and could not get any further. I am very grateful and happy that I got this mask and that I can further develop physically and mentally. Definitely recommend this product! Will definitely purchase again from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: anca_iorgoveanu

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fantastic value!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this product for breath training while running. It was a much better value than what we could have purchased at a sports store. The fit of the mask was great and adjusted to both him and I. It was easy to figure out how to switch between levels. I would definitely consider buying again from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet effective
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised. Everything came in perfect condition and packaged. One thing I would suggest is that if you are borderline 150 lbs, order the small and not the medium size. I 155ish, so I ordered the medium size. It holds up, but i almost run out of velcro in the back to tighten it. One of the valves doesn't work properly, but the other one does perfectly, so you can feel the difference in air restriction when switching levels. Overall, it works, not a perfect fit for me, but I have been using it for a couple of weeks now and have nothing negative to say about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Laklic

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right size ! I’m 6 foot 145 pounds and the medium was too big
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and great customer service! I ordered a medium and it was a little too big, so I emailed the seller and they answered right back and sent out the small! No charges at all. I highly recommend this product. I’m using it to control and better my breathing while doing cardio. The only issue I had was that there is no instructions on which valves are more restricted (green or white)
customer_reviews.author: Tina Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this mask. It’s awful and I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul  Jama

customer_reviews.title: Great training mask
customer_reviews.text: Excellent training mask, just to be clear this is not elevation training, this nor any other like it, yes, even that brand name. This restricts your breathing. Still a great product if you want to push harder on your workouts.

customer_reviews.title: Run with no filters first.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my face, didn't have fun running four miles the first time to realize I wasn't ready for filters hahaha.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Corrects your Breathing technique
customer_reviews.text: By the third time i wore the mask, the mechanism to adjust the levels warped. Only one side was fully functional. I only used it up to level 8. Due to facial hair, the seal was not as contained (which was expected. Even with these unfortunate mishaps, the masked forced me to breathe correctly during my work.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you now not to put any valves in when you first run because this thing really does work...I’m a distance runner and this has helped my breathing immensely! I would recommend to turn on lowest setting when running and the highest setting when you’re walking in between intervals so you can get better acclimated to the resistance
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Storey

customer_reviews.title: Super product that helps a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This training mask is exactly what I needed, it is working very well for me and its even more than I expected. I use the mask in the gym and while running. I have asthma so I use it at home as well during usual activity, it does improve my breathing. It is way easier to breath normally after I use it. Really good product!
customer_reviews.author: D & G

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Its easy to use and fits perfectly. You can change the levels without taking the mask off - trust me this feature is a must have as you'll need to adjust sometimes during your workout. The design is nice and it comes with an instructions manual which is helpful. Happy I bought this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much breathing restriction there was in the mask. I have not put it to use in a workout yet.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Stidham

customer_reviews.title: Workout mask~ great!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it! He runs in the morning when it’s really windy and cold out, it helps him a lot with the mask on!
customer_reviews.author: Angel C.

customer_reviews.title: It will change your workout routine for the good!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mask to push my workouts to the next level. It's only been a couple of days using it and I can already see and feel the results. My breathing improved and I am stronger in my endurance workouts. If you are on the fence, don't hesitate and get this mask. It will change your workout routine for the good!
customer_reviews.author: dragos robert nita

customer_reviews.title: This training mask is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wow, thanks GO4FIT for this workout mask, it is amazing. It works very well. The levels can be adjusted durring use - I love this feature as I can change the breathing resistance while running. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin T

customer_reviews.title: The best training mask you can get!!! I just love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by the quality of the product. This is a high class quality training mask. It's just perfect. First training was a great surprise. I will definitely recommend it to my teammates!
customer_reviews.author: Ionut

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feels good
customer_reviews.text: Fits great...not too big and not too small... haven't gotten a chance to use it yet...
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Spartan workout mood enhancer. Makes you feel like a beast!
customer_reviews.text: Was sceptical purchasing this, but after trying it out, realized the difference how much rhythmic breathing can help you put your mind in the mood. Felt like goin to cross fit every time.
customer_reviews.author: BA34

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I never got to try out this product. As soon as I opened the packaging, I observed a large black hair inside of the mask and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I use the mask while I'm working out,works very well.has different levels of restricted breathing.
customer_reviews.author: EAGLESSB52

customer_reviews.title: Got my money worth
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and so far my son loves it. It works great
customer_reviews.author: Alicia George

customer_reviews.title: Will probably not get the mask that is pictured
customer_reviews.text: 1st I'll say the actual mask isn't bad, but a few issues I have is I received something that isn't photoed, and what I did receive was slightly damaged. The actual strap has small tares in it and the more I use the mask the worse they get. I would rate higher had the strap not been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ces

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that helps with the breathing during workout.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: I just got this as a gift from my wife and i love it ! I can ride my bike without worrying of sore throat :)
customer_reviews.author: Mihai Valentin Satran

customer_reviews.title: It's easier now to breathe
customer_reviews.text: This product was the best present what I could received. I have more fun now running.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not the Item shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Not the item shown in the pictures and doesnt fit great
customer_reviews.author: Alan Marin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this mask!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best workout mask I used so far. I own 2 other different brands but this is the best quality. It fits perfectly and the sleeves are flexible and durrable even after wash. I use the mask at the gym, and when running. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jhon

product_meta.title: GO4FIT WORKOUT MASK | FITNESS MASK | GYM, BREATHING, CARDIO, ELEVATION EXERCISE TRAINING | ENDURANCE MASK
product_meta.description:
24 Breathing Levels: Beginner: 1-8 Medium: 9-16 Advanced 17-24.

Train with the GO4FIT workout mask! The gym mask will let you control your breathing by limiting the air supply your lungs receive resulting in higher pulmonary resistance and in stronger lung muscles.
The endurance mask simulates workout at high altitude and upgrades your training to a more intense, powerful and efficient routine. Trick your body to feel like training at a high altitude with the GO4FIT workout mask! Get more STAMINA, go beyond your limits, get the results you always wanted in less than half or your usual training time.

Why should you get your own GO4FIT workout mask? 

- BOOST your ENDURANCE to effort and RESISTANCE training
- 24 Breathing Levels: Beginner: 1-8 Medium: 9-16 Advanced 17-24
- Continuously train and adjust your resistance levels on the go, without taking off your mask.
- High quality, premium sleeves
- CARRY CASE INCLUDED
- 100% money back guarantee, in case you are not satisfied with our product
- send us a message and get an answer back in less than 24 hours 

What are you losing in case you will not get your GO4FIT workout mask?

-You will get the same workout results, as always
-You will not improve your breathing
-You will continue to train at a low intensity
-You will continue to train in more time, with less results
-you will lose our special mask for training offer
